channel.title: CBNNews.com
channel.copyright: Copyright 2011. The Christian Broadcasting Network, Inc.

item.title: Brody File: Trump Gets A+ on 'Evangelical Report Card' for His First Year
item.description: In addition to policy decisions addressing evangelical issues, Trump has appointed many evangelicals to Cabinet and sub-cabinet positions and granted unprecedented White House access to their leaders.

item.title: Shiver Me Timbers! New Signs Pirates Liked Booty and Books
item.description: Dead men tell no tales, but there’s new evidence that somebody aboard the pirate Blackbeard’s flagship harbored books among the booty.

item.title: 'Mama Warrior' in Miami Aids Children of Deported Migrants
item.description: The 29-year-old Mexican farmworker was stressed and afraid. Her husband had just been detained by immigration authorities as he left a South Florida construction site and was about to be deported. She feared the same would soon happen to her. What would become of her two kids?

item.title: US Gov't Shuts Down, Pence Blasts Democrats
item.description: Ironically, the shutdown comes on the first anniversary of President Donald Trump's inauguration.

item.title: House Passes Major Pro-Life Legislation as Thousands March for Life in DC
item.description: Just before thousands of pro-life advocates began their march from the National Mall to the Supreme Court, the House passed major pro-life legislation that would legally protect babies born alive after botched abortions.

item.title: 'The Locker Room's Binding Force:' the Faith of the Philadelphia Eagles
item.description: As reflected in a video on Facebook, Christianity is a big part of the Philadelphia Eagles, a team that takes to the field Sunday in the NFC Conference Championship.

item.title: Activist Mommy Blasts Showtime's Move to Include First 'Non-Binary' Character In TV Show
item.description: The first non-gender role on an American television show is stirring controversy.  "Activist Mommy" Elizabeth Johnston talks about Christians responding with love to this issue and how to address the problem.

item.title: What It Really Means to Be Pro-Life: Why the Movement Wants to Take on More
item.description: Pro-life leaders want their movement to grow, and not just in size. They're re-casting a vision for what it means to be "pro-life" in 2018 and it includes more than just a focus on the womb.

item.title: Beyond the Shutdown Showdown, How Faith Fuels Paul Ryan's Fight: 'Pray That We Help Heal This Country'
item.description: Ahead of Friday's March for Life, House Speaker Paul Ryan discusses faith, the power of prayer, and pro life legislation with CBN News.

item.title: Ex-Olympic Doc Forced to Hear Victims: 'She took her own life because she couldn't deal with the pain'
item.description: Larry Nassar is forced to listen to more than a hundred of his victims recount his abuses in a Michigan court before he's sentenced for sexual assault.

item.title: Indonesia Christians Facing Deportation from US Could Face Persecution if Sent Home
item.description: A U.S. judge likened the Trump administrations plans to deport 51 Indonesia Christians back to their homeland to hundreds of Jewish refugees fleeing the Nazis in 1939.

item.title: Helicopter with Zimbabwe opposition leader crashes, kills 5
item.description: A group of prominent friends, including a key Zimbabwean opposition leader and a Texas-based investor and philanthropist, were killed when their helicopter crashed and burned in New Mexico.

item.title: Speaker Ryan 'Ecstatic' to Speak at 45th Annual March For Life
item.description: Tens of thousands of people are expected at the 45th Annual March for Life Friday in Washington, DC, but it’s a good bet that none of them will be as excited as House Speaker Paul Ryan.

item.title: Trump Becoming First President to Address March for Life LIVE
item.description: It’s the biggest pro-life event of any year, but the March for Life often gets just tiny amounts of coverage in the mainstream media.

item.title: VP Mike Pence Rallies ‘Pro-Life Generation’
item.description: Vice President Mike Pence spoke at the annual March for Life reception at the White House Thursday evening and thanked the student activists for protecting the sanctity of life in America.

item.title: Pic of the Day: Franklin Graham Enjoying the Snow
item.description: Evangelist Franklin Graham took a snow selfie and posted it on Facebook. He said the "clean layer of white" at his home in the mountains of North Carolina reminds him of Psalm 51.

item.title: 'It's Just a Miracle From God': Girl Once on Life Support Now Awake and Talking
item.description: Chloe Clark, the little girl who suffered a head injury that left her in a coma and on life support, is now awake and responsive and her parents are giving thanks to God. They also credit the thousands of people who rallied to pray and support them.

item.title: Michigan Meteor Did Not Cause Earthquake
item.description: A meteor lit up the sky in Michigan Tuesday night and a tweet from the National Weather Service in Detroit led many people to believe it resulted in a magnitude 2.0 earthquake. That's not the case, here's why.

item.title: 'They Looked Happy and Healthy': Family Shocked by Reports of 13 Starved Children
item.description: The extended families of the 13 California children who police say were starved and tortured are speaking out.

item.title: Dow 26,000 and Apple's $350B Pledge Just Latest Examples of Trump Boom
item.description: Stocks have had a huge move upward since Donald Trump's election, closing above 26,000 for the first time Wednesday.

item.title: Wintry Blast Brings Chaos and Death to the Deep South
item.description: This isn't the kind of weather most southerners signed up for.
